name: Space Squabble
description:
This game is made for Ludum Dare in 48 hours by GoldenEvolution with the theme 'Unstable'.

What is this game about?

Two people, a pilot and an engineer, are flying their spaceship, when out of nowhere they get attacked. In order to escape, they decide to fly into an asteroid field. With their partially broken spaceship, they need to use their grapple hook to retrieve scrap in order to repair their ship. Because of this whole situation, both the pilot and the engineer are getting on each other's nerves.

Controls

W and S or Up arrow and Down arrow to move up and down.
Mouse to aim.
Left mouse button to use the grappling gun or repair.
P to pause, for adjusting volume.

Socials

My YouTube channel: YouTube
My Twitter: Twitter

Tools
  • Unity (game engine)
  • Aseprite (art)
  • BFXR (producing sound effects)
  • Audacity (editing sound effects)
